name: Dominator_Assault.Dark_Assault
display_help: Blind and drain your foes with dark energies. Dark Assault allows you to pummel your foes with heavy hitting melee attacks as well as several ranged attacks. Many of Dark Assaults powers reduce their victims' chance to hit.

powers.name: Dominator_Assault.Dark_Assault.Dark_Blast
powers.display_help: A long range blast of dark energy. Deals moderate Negative Energy damage and reduces the target's chance to hit. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

powers.name: Dominator_Assault.Dark_Assault.Smite
powers.display_help: You wrap your fists with Negative Energy channeled from the Netherworld and Smite your foe with a powerful blow. Smite clouds the target's vision, lowering their chance to hit for a short time. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

powers.name: Dominator_Assault.Dark_Assault.Gloom
powers.display_help: Gloom slowly drains a target of life, while reducing their chance to hit. Slower than Dark Blast, but deals more damage over time. Damage: High(DoT), Recharge: Moderate

display_info: 8 ticks of 11.62 negative energy damage over 3.6s on target
8 ticks of 13.78 negative energy damage over 3.6s on target

powers.name: Dominator_Assault.Dark_Assault.Night_Fall
powers.display_help: Unleashes a cone shaped burst of particles from the Netherworld. All targets within the modest range of this power take Negative Energy damage and have a reduced chance to hit. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Slow

display_info.Effect Area: Cone — 60 ft. radius 20° arc (10 targets max)

display_info: 10 ticks of 7.71 negative energy damage over 2.8s on target
10 ticks of 6.92 negative energy damage over 2.8s on target

powers.name: Dominator_Assault.Dark_Assault.Gather_Shadows
powers.display_help: By collecting shadows from your surroundings you boost your damage and the secondary effects of your powers. Your powers' effects like Heals, Defense Buffs, Endurance Drains, Disorients, Holds, Immobilizes, Knockbacks and more, are all improved. The effects of Gather Shadows last a short while, and only the next couple of attacks will be boosted. Recharge: Long

display_info: 74.50% strength to healing, ranged, melee, AoE, smashing, lethal, fire, cold, energy, negative energy, psionic, unique, defense, absorption, endurance, to hit, run speed, fly speed, confuse, terrorize, hold, immobilize, stun, sleep for 10s on self
34.00% strength to smashing damage, lethal damage, fire damage, cold damage, energy damage, negative energy damage, psionic damage, toxic damage for 10s on self

powers.name: Dominator_Assault.Dark_Assault.Moonbeam
powers.display_help: You release a burst of negative energy to foes around you dealing moderate Negative Energy damage, reducing their chance to hit and sapping their health over time. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
powers.display_short_help: PBAoE, Moderate DMG(Negative), Foe -To Hit, Minor DoT(Negative)

display_info: 4 ticks of 80.00% chance for 5.84 negative energy damage over 3.1s on target after 0.5s delay

powers.name: Dominator_Assault.Dark_Assault.Life_Drain
powers.display_help: You can tap the power of the Netherworld to steal some life from a target foe and reduce their chance to hit. Some of that stolen life is transferred to you in the form of Hit Points. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate
powers.display_short_help: Ranged, High DMG(Negative), Target -To Hit, Self +HP

powers.name: Dominator_Assault.Dark_Assault.Death_Shroud
powers.display_help: An extremely long range and accurate beam of Negative Energy that deals tremendous damage and reduces the target's chance to hit. This is a sniper attack, and is best fired from a distance, as it can be interrupted. If you are engaged in battle this attack becomes instant-cast. If you are not engaged, it will do bonus damage. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Slow

powers.name: Dominator_Assault.Dark_Assault.Midnight_Grasp
powers.display_help: Mastery over the forces of the Netherworld allows you to create dark tentacles that can Immobilize a foe, reduce their chance to hit and continuously drain their life force. Damage: Superior(DoT), Recharge: Slow
powers.display_short_help: Melee, Superior DMG(Negative), Foe Immobilize, -To Hit

display_info: 5 ticks of 6.42 negative energy damage over 3.1s on target after 0.5s delay
